title: Top Down Bottom Up Shade
transcripts:
Top Down Bottom Up Ivory or White Shades

This modern honeycomb shade gives you the option of raising the shade in a traditional fashion or lowering the shadTop Down Bottom Up Shadese from the top. This shade is light-filtering, energy-efficient and has a cordless lift system, too. It's easy to install and will be a handsome addition to your windows. 100% polyester. Inside or outside mount. Hardware and installation instructions included. Dust or vacuum to clean.



Hi, Im here to show you, the ease and versatility of this great shade.

Its multi-functions are so simple to use.

Id like to begin, by explaining something of shade itself - its called a cellular shade. 

Its practical, economical and looks great!  The honeycomb shape creates pockets of insulation, as well as light control.

This innovative shade, allows you to let light in from the top, bottom or both areas, at the same time, depending on how much privacy and light you desire.

So you get enjoy privacy, view and insulation

To raise the shade, Bottom up, simply raise the shade from the bottom rail, using the plastic clip that youve attached to the shadepositioning the shade exactly where you want.

Its just as easy to close the shade, just push down, again, using the plastic clip.

To enjoy more light control, and maintain privacy, you can lower the shade, from the top,  Top down, or raise in both directions at the same time  top down,  bottom up !

There are 2 cords, on the right side of the shade, and each is marked with an up or a down arrowthe left cord, (down arrow) is used to lower the shade from the top.

Simply pull that cord gently, releasing the spring action, and it will lower the shade to area you want to leave open.

To close the top, pull on the right cord, (up arrow), and the built in tension spring, allows you to adjust the shade to a partial or fully closed position.

The choices are yours, and with the many standard sizes offered, you can take it home with you now, to enjoy.

Easy to use, energy efficient, provides insulation and sound absorption.  Available in 8 sizes in white or ivory. 

Be Here Now, Top Down, Bottom Up honeycomb shades.

Available at Bed Bath & Beyond.
